VEC.A: There are {5} slices in this chart.

VPR.A: The ridgeline representing Film Screenings shows a {Periodic fluctuation}.

EVJ.A: The ridgeline representing {Music Festivals} has the highest peak.

EVJ.Q: Which label has the highest density at X =57.1?
EVJ.A: At X =57.1,the label with the highest density is {Food Festivals}

NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks exceed 42? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.
NF.A: {Film Screenings}'s peak at {83},{Theater Performances}'s peak at {83},{Traditional Ceremonies}'s peak at {82}

NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks below 71? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.
NF.A: {Music Festivals}'s peak at {10},{Food Festivals}'s peak at {25}

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Music Festivals or Film Screenings?
NC.A: {Film Screenings} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Food Festivals or Music Festivals?
NC.A: {Food Festivals} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Traditional Ceremonies or Music Festivals?
NC.A: {Traditional Ceremonies} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Food Festivals or Theater Performances?
NC.A: {Theater Performances} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.
